title: How to Make Different Smilies

steps.headline: Understand that  each "face" smiley can either have a nose, or no nose.
steps.description: If you choose to use a nose, simply add a dash between the eyes and the mouth.they don't work trust me   Here is what it would look like  :-)

steps.headline: Make eyes (which is required for any "face" smiley) press :   or  =   or for (sun)glasses  B

Make a mouth (which is also usually required for a "face" smiley) press  )   if happy ),   (   if sad,   |  if mad or frowning, 9 is delicious or tasty gossip, P is for crazy or sticking tongue out, X or / for my lips are sealed, !
steps.description: if yelling, D if excited... or here is some other ways to make a happy or sad smiley ]   or   [[[Image:Make Different Smilies Step 3 Version 2.jpg|center]]

steps.headline: Learn that there are many ways to make different types of smilies.
steps.description: Here are some examples by using the symbols above  =]   =[   :-)   :-(   =-D   :)   :D   :(   =)   =(   =D

steps.headline: Note that here are some different smilies expressing bigger feelings (only examples)  :-9  :-X  :-P  :-|
Make a sad smiley cry  :'(   Simply press : then a ' and then (
Remember that  now that you have the "face" smilies covered, lets work on the "body."
steps.description: The body is also simple. Just make a face and add   ->-<    it would look like this  :)->-<

steps.headline: Look at emotions.
steps.description: Still being considered a smiley, emoticons show expression. For example, a heart would be  <3     You can see the shape of a heart! Here are some fun food emoticons:

steps.headline: you can also make a devil:  3:)
and you can make a shark:   (^^^)
steps.description: cookie  O pie   [) cupcake   [} ice cream   <o pizza   <| hot dog   [|] waffle   # snow ice cream   * lollipop   -@  or  -o

steps.headline: Notice that there are so many more!
steps.description:
Here are the instructions on how to make the food emoticons above:
cookie, simply press Caps Lock then o.
pie, press  [  then press shift and 0 to make )
cupcake, press [  then press shift and ] to make }
ice cream, press shift and the , button to make <  then o
pizza, press shift and then , button to make <  then shift and \ button to make |
hot dog, press [  then shift and the \ button to make |  then ]
waffle, simply press shift and the 3 button to make #
snow ice cream, simply press shift and the 8 button to make *
lollipop, press - then @ or o

steps.headline: Awesome!
steps.description: Experiment and you'll find much more you can make! Remember to just have fun and ideas will come as you go! : )

text:
Understand that  each "face" smiley can either have a nose, or no nose. If you choose to use a nose, simply add a dash between the eyes and the mouth.they don't work trust me   Here is what it would look like  :-) Make eyes (which is required for any "face" smiley) press :   or  =   or for (sun)glasses  B  Make a mouth (which is also usually required for a "face" smiley) press  )   if happy ),   (   if sad,   |  if mad or frowning, 9 is delicious or tasty gossip, P is for crazy or sticking tongue out, X or / for my lips are sealed, ! if yelling, D if excited... or here is some other ways to make a happy or sad smiley ]   or   [[[Image:Make Different Smilies Step 3 Version 2.jpg|center]] Learn that there are many ways to make different types of smilies. Here are some examples by using the symbols above  =]   =[   :-)   :-(   =-D   :)   :D   :(   =)   =(   =D Note that here are some different smilies expressing bigger feelings (only examples)  :-9  :-X  :-P  :-|  Make a sad smiley cry  :'(   Simply press : then a ' and then (  Remember that  now that you have the "face" smilies covered, lets work on the "body." The body is also simple. Just make a face and add   ->-<    it would look like this  :)->-< Look at emotions. Still being considered a smiley, emoticons show expression. For example, a heart would be  <3     You can see the shape of a heart! Here are some fun food emoticons: you can also make a devil:  3:)  and you can make a shark:   (^^^) cookie  O pie   [) cupcake   [} ice cream   <o pizza   <| hot dog   [|] waffle   # snow ice cream   * lollipop   -@  or  -o Notice that there are so many more! Here are the instructions on how to make the food emoticons above:
cookie, simply press Caps Lock then o.
pie, press  [  then press shift and 0 to make )
cupcake, press [  then press shift and ] to make }
ice cream, press shift and the , button to make <  then o
pizza, press shift and then , button to make <  then shift and \ button to make |
hot dog, press [  then shift and the \ button to make |  then ]
waffle, simply press shift and the 3 button to make #
snow ice cream, simply press shift and the 8 button to make *
lollipop, press - then @ or o Awesome! Experiment and you'll find much more you can make! Remember to just have fun and ideas will come as you go! : )
